books.name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry Potter, an ordinary boy living with his aunt and uncle, discovers he's a wizard on his 11th birthday. Embark on his first magical adventure at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where he uncovers the mystery behind a powerful stone.

books.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: In his second year at Hogwarts, Harry faces new dangers as an ancient chamber is reopened, releasing a dark force that threatens the school and its students. Can Harry uncover the secret of the Chamber of Secrets before itâ€™s too late?

books.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry returns for his third year at Hogwarts to find out that a dangerous prisoner has escaped from Azkaban. With new allies and old enemies, Harry must confront his past and uncover the truth about his mysterious connection to the escaped convict.

books.name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: In his fourth year at Hogwarts, Harry unexpectedly becomes a contestant in the dangerous Triwizard Tournament. As the stakes rise and dark forces gather, Harry finds himself at the center of an ominous plot that threatens the wizarding world.

books.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry's fifth year at Hogwarts is filled with tension as the wizarding world faces denial about the return of Lord Voldemort. As Harry forms a secret group to defend against the rising threat, he learns more about his own destiny and the power of unity.

chapters.name: The Only One He Ever Feared

books.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: As dark forces tighten their grip, Harry delves into the mysterious past of Lord Voldemort with the help of an old potions book. In this penultimate book, friendships are tested, secrets are revealed, and Harry faces a heartbreaking loss.

books.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: In the epic conclusion to the series, Harry, Ron, and Hermione embark on a perilous journey to find and destroy Voldemortâ€™s Horcruxes. With the final battle looming, Harry must make the ultimate sacrifice to save the wizarding world.

books.name: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child
books.author: J.K. Rowling, Jack Thorne, John Tiffany
books.description: Set 19 years after the events of the original series, Harryâ€™s son Albus struggles with his family legacy. As dark forces re-emerge, father and son must confront the weight of their past in this new magical adventure.

books.name: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: In the first book of the epic trilogy, the dark lord Sauron seeks the One Ring that will allow him to control Middle-earth. A young hobbit named Frodo Baggins is entrusted with the ring and embarks on a perilous journey to Mount Doom to destroy it.

chapters.name: In The House Of Tom Bombadil
At The Sign Of The Prancing Pony

books.name: The Two Towers
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: In the second book of the trilogy, Frodo and Sam continue their journey to Mordor, while Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli search for Merry and Pippin, who have been captured by the orcs. The fate of Middle-earth hangs in the balance.

chapters.name: The King Of The Golden Hall

books.name: The Return of the King
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: In the final book of the trilogy, the forces of good and evil converge on the fields of Gondor for the epic Battle of the Pelennor Fields. As the fate of Middle-earth is decided, Frodo and Sam must confront the dark lord Sauron in the heart of Mordor.

chapters.name: The Passing Of The Grey Company
The Battle Of The Pelennor Fields

books.name: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who enjoys a quiet life, is swept into an unexpected adventure when the wizard Gandalf and a group of dwarves arrive at his door. Together, they set out to reclaim the dwarves' homeland from the dragon Smaug.

chapters.name: Out Of The Frying Pan Into The Fire

book_series.title: A Song of Ice and Fire

books.name: A Game of Thrones
books.author: George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the first book of the epic series, the noble houses of Westeros vie for control of the Iron Throne. As dark forces gather beyond the Wall, the fate of the Seven Kingdoms hangs in the balance.

books.name: A Clash of Kings
books.author: George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the second book of the series, the War of the Five Kings rages across Westeros as rival claimants fight for the Iron Throne. Meanwhile, Daenerys Targaryen seeks to reclaim her family's throne in the east.

books.name: A Storm of Swords
books.author: George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the third book of the series, the War of the Five Kings reaches its climax as the fate of Westeros is decided. Meanwhile, Jon Snow and the Night's Watch face the threat of the wildlings and the White Walkers beyond the Wall.

books.name: A Feast for Crows
books.author: George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the fourth book of the series, the aftermath of the War of the Five Kings is felt across Westeros as new power struggles emerge. Meanwhile, Daenerys Targaryen faces challenges in her quest to reclaim the Iron Throne.

chapters.name: Chapter 40   The Princess In The Tower

books.name: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
books.author: C.S. Lewis
books.description: Four siblings discover a magical world through a wardrobe in this classic tale of good versus evil. As they journey through Narnia, they encounter talking animals, mythical creatures, and the powerful lion Aslan.

books.name: Prince Caspian
books.author: C.S. Lewis
books.description: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia to help Prince Caspian reclaim his throne from his evil uncle Miraz. Along the way, they encounter old friends, new enemies, and embark on a quest to restore Narnia to its former glory.

books.name: The Last Wish
books.author: Andrzej Sapkowski
books.description: This collection of short stories introduces readers to Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter known as a Witcher. As Geralt navigates a world filled with magic, politics, and treachery, he must confront his own destiny and the dark forces that threaten the realm.

books.name: Blood of Elves
books.author: Andrzej Sapkowski
books.description: As war rages across the land, Geralt of Rivia takes on a new mission to protect Ciri, a young princess with a powerful destiny. Alongside his companions, Geralt must navigate a world of political intrigue, magical threats, and ancient prophecies to ensure Ciri's survival and fulfill her potential.

books.name: The Lightning Thief
books.author: Rick Riordan
books.description: Percy Jackson discovers he is a demigod, the son of Poseidon, and embarks on a quest to prevent a war among the gods. Along the way, he must navigate a world of monsters, magic, and ancient prophecies, all while uncovering the truth about his own identity.

books.name: The Sea of Monsters
books.author: Rick Riordan
books.description: Percy Jackson and his friends embark on a quest to find the mythical Golden Fleece, which has the power to save their home, Camp Half-Blood. Along the way, they encounter new allies, face old enemies, and confront the challenges of the Sea of Monsters.

books.name: The Titan's Curse
books.author: Rick Riordan
books.description: When the goddess Artemis goes missing, Percy Jackson and his friends must embark on a quest to rescue her and prevent a war among the gods. Along the way, they encounter new allies, face old enemies, and confront the challenges of the Titan's Curse.

books.name: The Battle of the Labyrinth
books.author: Rick Riordan
books.description: Percy Jackson and his friends must navigate the treacherous Labyrinth to prevent the rise of the Titan lord Kronos. Along the way, they encounter new allies, face old enemies, and confront the challenges of the Battle of the Labyrinth.

books.name: The Last Olympian
books.author: Rick Riordan
books.description: As the final battle between the gods and the Titans looms, Percy Jackson and his friends must defend Olympus and prevent the destruction of Western civilization. Along the way, they encounter new allies, face old enemies, and confront the challenges of the Last Olympian.
